Are They Heufalling Apart?

Aster Cometwing • January 13, 2025

Last updated: 13 January 2025, 19:40 RST

Heufauna has narrowly avoided Amujization today, as it and the surrounding lands have become part of one whole union.

Reborn Amuj recently split from Heufauna, threatening Amujization. It was immediately considered a disputed ŋation by some, and the Vieŋŋa Conference between Kozdenen, Heufauna and Reborn Amuj was formed.

The end result of the Vieŋŋa Conference was that Reborn Amuj became the shortest-lived ŋation in the ŋorld (Guiŋŋǝss Ŋorld Records says it lasted only 7 hours 55 minutes, from 06:07 RST to 14:02 RST), as it became part of the "Amuj Solution". Heufauna, Reborn Amuj, and other surrounding lands merged into the so-called CMCic Federation.

How exactly this new, and hopefully final, result of the incident pessimistically referred to as "the Neo-Amujxplosion" will affect the interŋational community is yet to be determined. However, Rauratoshan's queen regent Nozomi is cautiously optimistic about it. The Quing officially stated that "while the CMCic Federation is still a bit new, I would support admission [to the United Ŋations] as an observer."
